SYSTEM: SummaryInternship2014-OEG.pdf: Página 10
The LONI pipeline 
LONI Pipeline:  
 
•Workflow system for neuroimaging analysis 
 
•Many workflows recorded and published 
 
•Workflows are likely to reuse parts of other 
workflows (common library of components) 
 
•Users can group sets of steps to organize, 
simplify and reuse workflows (groupings).
